CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Standard Consultation relative to Specialist Surgery?
SRP.A: Standard Consultation is {above} Specialist Surgery in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total average treatment cost?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Pediatric Treatment}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total average treatment cost?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Standard Consultation}.

VE.Q: What is Standard Consultation's Average Treatment Cost in 1980?
VE.A: Standard Consultation's average treatment cost in 1980 is {5068.63} $.

VE.Q: What is Rehabilitation Therapy's Average Treatment Cost in 1984?
VE.A: Rehabilitation Therapy's average treatment cost in 1984 is {6018.57} $.

VE.Q: What is Chronic Care Program's Average Treatment Cost in 1983?
VE.A: Chronic Care Program's average treatment cost in 1983 is {3977.14} $.

VE.Q: What are the average treatment cost of Preventative Screening, Chronic Care Program, and Emergency Procedure in 1980?
VE.A: Preventative Screening's average treatment cost is {5240.79} $, Chronic Care Program's average treatment cost is {5085} $, Emergency Procedure's average treatment cost is {5010.84} $.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Average Treatment Cost in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum average treatment cost is {3422.35} $.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Average Treatment Cost in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum average treatment cost is {6018.57} $.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Average Treatment Cost level recorded for Chronic Care Program?
EVJ.A: Chronic Care Program reached approximately {5085.00} $ in {1980}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Average Treatment Cost level recorded for Chronic Care Program?
EVJ.A: Chronic Care Program's lowest recorded level is approximately {3663.31} $ in {1984}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Average Treatment Cost?
SC.A: The average total average treatment cost is {33051.05} $.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Average Treatment Cost go below 32035.78 $? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Average Treatment Cost exceed 33712.66 $? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1982 and 1984, did the total Average Treatment Cost experience a larger or smaller change than between 1980 and 1981?
NC.A: The change in total average treatment cost between 1982 and 1984 was {larger} than between 1980 and 1981.

NC.Q: Between 1980 and 1983, was the average total Average Treatment Cost higher or lower than between 1980 and 1982?
NC.A: The average total average treatment cost between 1980 and 1983 was {lower} than between 1980 and 1982.

NC.Q: Between 1981 and 1984, was the average total Average Treatment Cost higher or lower than between 1981 and 1983?
NC.A: The average total average treatment cost between 1981 and 1984 was {lower} than between 1981 and 1983.

NC.Q: Between 1981 and 1983, did the total Average Treatment Cost experience a larger or smaller change than between 1982 and 1984?
NC.A: The change in total average treatment cost between 1981 and 1983 was {larger} than between 1982 and 1984.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Pediatric Treatment} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Standard Consultation, Chronic Care Program, Emergency Procedure, Preventative Screening, Specialist Surgery, Pediatric Treatment, Rehabilitation Therapy}.
